title: Detection and photothermal inactivation of Gram-positive and Gram-negative bloodstream bacteria using photonic crystal biosensor and plasmonic core–shell
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11594-11603
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01802H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ruth Birhanu Hayilesilassie, Abebe Belay Gemta, Fekadu Tolessa Maremi, Alemayehu Getahun Kumela, Kusse Gudishe, Bereket Delga Dana
This study introduces a tailored theoretical framework for a one-dimensional photonic crystal biosensor composed of (ZrO2/GaN)N/defect layer/(ZrO2/GaN)N, designed to detect Gram-positive and Gram-negative bloodstream bacteria employing the transfer matrix method.
